entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Petunia is Lily's sister, who is upset and defensive about someone reading her private letter.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is Petunia's sister, who has been sneaking into Petunia's room with a boy.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Severus Snape is a Hogwarts teacher, who saw the envelope and believes there are wizards working undercover in the postal service.

entities.name: harry potter (implied)
entities.description: Although not explicitly mentioned, it can be inferred that Harry Potter is the boy who found Petunia's letter and has been sneaking into her room with Lily.

entities.name: hogwarts express
entities.description: The Hogwarts Express is a train that takes students from Platform 9 3/4 to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

relationships.description: Petunia and Lily are sisters, as mentioned in the conversation between them.
Severus Snape believes that Harry Potter is a wizard who has contacted Hogwarts, as mentioned in the conversation between Snape and Lily.
Petunia is upset with Harry Potter, as she believes he has been sneaking into her room and reading her private letter.
Lily is also involved in the conflict with Harry Potter, as she has been sneaking into Petunia's room with him.
